name: An Autumn in Everry Town
description:
An Autumn in Everry Town was made as a submission for the Zenojam

For our take on the theme "It never ends" we wanted the theme to be more narrative centric rather than gameplay centric. The story outlines a serious issue in current society with child abductions creating unsafe environments for children all around the world.

Play using A and D to move, Space to interact and the mouse to use your phone. Walk through the story of the tragic Kool Kids Club, slowly uncovering their fate. Ultimately the issue will come to light showing how no matter the precautions taken, these terrible acts and the trauma and pain inflicted on the unknowing friends and family will never end.

The team behind the game:

Benjamin Gatt - Programmer/Designer
Daniel Cutajar - Artist/Designer/Writer
Julian Gatt - Programmer/Technical Artist
Matty Jenkins - Artist/Designer/Writer
Sean Borg - Programmer

Thanks for playing and hope you enjoy our little game!
